name: Red Archer
description:
(  Webgl version may have issues, please try the windows downloadable version if possible.....  )



Controls explained in-game....

Made ( Rushed .....) in roughly 1 and half days for Ludum Dare 48.

Move deeper and deeper down the temple stomping every demon in your path

( I forgot to mention it in-game but the slow-mo ability is very important to aim in mid-air )

Currently has :
 - Three arenas

- One boss fight at the end 

Like what you see ?  ;)

Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord

Press Esc in the windows version to exit
